data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Shuang-Shuang, Xu, Zai-Fu (2016): Kryptosega Kimsey, 1986 (Hymenoptera, Chrysididae) is newly recorded genus from Oriental Region, with description of one new species. Zootaxa 4121 (1): 73-76, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4121.1.5
